thread.section_title: eVitamins Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eVitamins | www.evitamins.com | 3 of 90
thread.title: FREEZE

author: FREEZE
title: FREEZE
text:
eVitamins offers supplements at decent prices. Shipping time and price also is quite reasonable all the way to India.
They ship the items which are 'in stock' immediately however for 'out of stock' items, they have taken longer than they mention on their website.
Customer service is excellent and they provide answers to all your questions promptly. I'm happy with their service.
